price: 34. Ils auront ce qu’ils voudront auprès de leur Seigneur. Telle est la récompense des bienfaiteurs.
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna ʿinda rabbihim dhālika jazāu al-muḥ'sinīna
